normalization_note: Voting and conversion weights normalized to weakest class = 1.0

equity_classes.conversion_rights: Convertible from Class B on a one-for-one basis
equity_classes.other_rights: Generally votes together with Class B as a single class

equity_classes.conversion_rights: Convertible into Class A on a one-for-one basis
equity_classes.other_rights: Automatically converts to Class A upon transfer, with limited exceptions

equity_classes.voting_rights: As determined by the Board of Directors
equity_classes.conversion_rights: As determined by the Board of Directors
equity_classes.dividend_rights: As determined by the Board of Directors
